Flow.description: Chose a method and return the flow metadata.
Flow.label: Flow OneView - Get Flow Metadata

fields.name: FlowPrompt_dsp
fields.fieldText: Flow OneView - Please select a Flow

fields.name: SelectionPrompt_dsp
fields.fieldText: How will you be processing the flow metadata?

value.stringValue: Your pasted data is more than the maximum number of characters!

textTemplates.name: ttDescriptionCopyPaste
textTemplates.text:
Copy/Paste all or part of your metadata source code between this utility and your source code editor.


Note: You will need to use VSCode, Code Builder or another tool to deploy the modified flow.

﻿Note: The character limit for this option is 131,072 characters.

textTemplates.name: ttDescriptionImportExport
textTemplates.text:
Upload a flow metadata file from your metadata source directory then save the changed file back to the source.


Note: You will need to use VSCode, Code Builder or another tool to deploy the modified flow.

Note: Some special characters and emojis may be lost when retrieving the metadata with this file import option.

textTemplates.name: ttDescriptionRetrieveDeploy
textTemplates.text:
Select a Screen Flow and let this utility Retrieve and Deploy the updated Flow.


NOTE: The built-in Retrieve/Deploy may not support all flow features if the FlowActionsBasePack hasn't been updated to the current API version.
